com.igeekinc.util.rules

Interface Rule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DateAfterRule, DateBeforeRule, DateExactlyRule, DateRule, DateTodayRule, DateWithinRule, ExtensionEqualsRule, IncludeExcludeRule, NameContainsRule, NameEndsWithRule, NameEqualsRule, NameRule, NameStartsWithRule, RuleSet, SizeEqualsRule, SizeGreaterThanRule, SizeLessThanRule, SizeRule, SubDirectoryOfRule

    public interface Rule
extends java.io.Serializable

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void init()
      Called at the beginning of a execution run to allow all rules to reinitialize themselves for the run.
      RuleMatch matchesRule(FileLike checkFile) 

    • Method Detail

      • matchesRule

        RuleMatch matchesRule(FileLike checkFile)

      • init

        void init()
        Called at the beginning of a execution run to allow all rules to reinitialize themselves for the run. Primarily used by relative date rules (e.g. "today") to set their base time.
